entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:36 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -38.1°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
